programme.title: Man Who Cried for Revenge
programme.desc: Davy Flanagan, a former Union officer who was part of an attempt to break out of a Confederate prison camp during the Civil War and suffered a blow to the head that left him with amnesia. Then a bounty hunter shows up to collect a bounty on his head as a deserter.

programme.title: I'll Die for Vengeance
programme.desc: A Mexican gang headed by vicious Pedro terrorizes the land between New Mexico and Arizona.

programme.title: Two Crosses at Danger Pass
programme.desc: Judy and Alex are the only two survivors of a punitive mission ordered by the rich and ruthless Moran.... The girl becomes his maid and the boy is adopted by a Quaker family. Alex, despite the philosophy of forgiveness he has been taught, plans to take revenge.

programme.title: White Apache
programme.desc: Outlaws attack a band of settlers and kill everyone except a pregnant woman who's rescued by a band of Indians. The woman dies giving birth but Chief White Bear adopts her male baby, naming him "Shining Sky," and raising him as brother to his own son, Black Wolf.

programme.title: Bad Man's River
programme.desc: Robber Roy King loses his wife, Alicia, to revolutionary Montero. Despite their rivalry they collaborate in an attempt to rob the Mexican government of one million dollars.

programme.title: Don't Wait, Django... Shoot!
programme.desc: Django returns home to discover that his father has been killed by local bandits in a business deal gone wrong.

programme.title: My Name is Pecos
programme.desc: Everyone wants to know who the Mexican is. He always answer slowly, "my name is Pecos". Pecos Martinez to be exact, and he's returned to his hometown of Houston to settle up with Clain, the leader of a gang of cut-throats. Clain is busy looking for the money from a recent robbery that's been stolen from him. Soon the stolen cash in Pecos' vengeance entwine and all hell breaks loose. Behind the scenes a Bible touting Undertaker (Umberto Raho), a cowardly saloon owner, & a helpful saloon girl become part of the story. This film made Woods as internationally known as Pecos in the third world countries as Franco Nero was known for Django. A Mexican hero against a gang and a town full of gringos- what more could you ask for?

programme.title: Buddy Goes West
programme.desc: Two outlaws, "The Doctor" and the Indian Girolamo, help a village fight a gang and a corrupt sheriff who has discovered gold beneath the town.

programme.title: Scalps
programme.desc: The commander of a Texan fort in the Civil War refuses to surrender to the Northerners, and tries to buy the local Indian tribe chief's daughter. The sage man refuses, and the Southerners massacre the tribe and abduct the young squaw anyway. The noble squaw manages to escape, and hides out with a rough rancher, who dislikes Indians, but hates the Southerners more. The odd couple joins forces, and tactics, to exert ultimate vengeance on the men at the fort.

programme.title: Payment in Blood
programme.desc: In 1867 Texas, after the Civil War, Colonel Thomas Blake and his men refuse to surrender, raiding Yankee towns. Rumors swirl that Blake kills for pleasure, not the Confederacy, leading to large bounties for his capture. However, Blake seeks $200,000 that vanished during the war from Confederate coffers. He sends Chamaco Gonzales to track down the missing fortune, hidden in General Beauregard's strong box.

programme.title: One Dollar Too Many
programme.desc: Suave gambler Clay Watson, cocky sharpshooter Moses Lang, and wily thespian Edwin Kean are a trio of criminals in the Old West.

programme.title: Buckaroo: The Winchester Does Not Forgive
programme.desc: The Winchester Does Not Forgive - When the stagecoach in which they travel is attacked by Monteiro's gang, Lash accepts to kill his friend to save his bacon.

programme.title: $1,000 on the Black
programme.desc: Twelve years ago, Sartana framed his brother Johnny for murder and stole his girlfriend. Now the town's undisputed boss and doted over by his possessive mother, Sartana seems safe - until, his sentence served, Johnny rides back into town.

programme.title: Ride in the Whirlwind
programme.desc: Three cowboys, mistaken for members of an outlaw gang, are relentlessly pursued by a posse.
